replies.msg: 兩三點再蒲頭啦

Last Sunday my friend James married Clara, his girlfriend from Tinder. A pastor married them in Rosewood hotel. I wrote "Wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness!" My elder brother wrote "Best wishes on this wonderful journey as you build your new lives together" My younger brother wrote "Thank you for letting me share in this joyful day. I wish you all the best as you embark on this wonderful union!" My sister wrote "Congratulations on finding each other! Your greatest adventure has just begun!" My cousin wrote "Wishing you fulfilment of every dream!" James honours his parents and is thankful for what they've done for him. His brother is also a good son whereas his sister needs to be a better daughter. In the east parents and teachers stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you should honour your parents and take care of them. James' cousin stole his watchband recently. It was a matter of honour to tell him about it. My brother felt honour bound to tell him too. His dad is a man of honour and high integrity. James is a kickboxing fan. In May Fred will be fighting Joe for the heavyweight title for the honour of his country. Winning it is a matter of personal honour, family honour and national honour. Last month his church held a banquet in honour of Fred. James asked whether I would do him the honour of accompanying him to the banquet which I did. It was a signal honour to meet him. When Fred saw us he said "It's a great honour to have you here James" We asked him if he would do us the honour of being a wrestling coach. He said "We'll have to see" A couple of waiters did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred said to a waitress "Will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" Fred said to us "I would be honoured if you could come and see my fight in May" We gave him an affirmative response. Last year Dana said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last fight. Besides winning the championship he was honoured with an award for excellence in grappling. By the way many people bought front row tickets for the next kickboxing event at half price or less due to a computer error but the organisation stated that they would honour these tickets nonetheless which could cost up to six hundred thousand dollars in lost earnings.
